text.__SUMMARY__: Lithocarpus ovalis is a species of plant in the Fagaceae family. It is endemic to the Philippines.
text.Sources: World Conservation Monitoring Centre (1998). "Lithocarpus ovalis". The IUCN Red List of Threatened Species. IUCN. 1998: e.T33343A9778590. doi:10.2305/IUCN.UK.1998.RLTS.T33343A9778590.en. Retrieved 16 December 2017.
